buildCommand: npx -y puro build web --release --web-renderer canvaskit || (git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git -b stable --depth 1 /tmp/flutter && export PATH="$PATH:/tmp/flutter/bin" && flutter config --no-analytics && flutter build web --release --web-renderer canvaskit)
installCommand: git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git -b stable --depth 1 /tmp/flutter && export PATH="$PATH:/tmp/flutter/bin" && flutter config --no-analytics && flutter pub get
